channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Powerful Spyware Exploits Enable a New String of ‘Watering Hole’ Attacks
item.description: Suspected Russian hackers have compromised a series of websites to utilize sophisticated spyware exploits that are eerily similar to those created by ...

item.title: Meta now allows preteens to explore Horizon Worlds with parent’s permission
item.description: Meta is now letting preteens with parent-managed accounts explore different experiences in its online virtual reality (VR) platform, Horizon Worlds, w...

item.title: Razer BlackShark V2 Pro Review: 70-Hour Battery and ’90s-Era Nostalgia
item.description: With 70 hours of battery life and a striking design, Razer’s wireless headset is a solid choice.

item.title: IBM Cloud to offer Intel’s Gaudi 3 AI chips next year
item.description: Intel has found its first -- and perhaps only -- cloud customer for its Gaudi 3 AI accelerator chips: IBM Cloud. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserve...

item.title: Best Wireless Headphones (2024): Tested Over Many Hours
item.description: Whether you need workout earbuds or gaming over-ears, these WIRED-tested picks sound like a million bucks.

item.title: Russian government hackers found using exploits made by spyware companies NSO and Intellexa
item.description: Google said the findings were an example of how exploits developed by spyware makers can end up in the hands of "dangerous threat actors." © 2024 Tech...

item.title: The Best Hearing Aids of 2024, Reviewed by Experts
item.description: These WIRED-tested and audiologist-approved devices will help you hear sounds more clearly. Never miss out on a dinner conversation again.

item.title: Social network Butterflies AI adds a feature that turns you into an AI character
item.description: Butterflies AI, the new social network where humans and AIs interact with each other, is launching a new Clones feature that turns you into an AI char...

item.title: Telegram Faces a Reckoning in Europe. Other Founders Should Beware
item.description: Politicians have long complained of Telegram CEO Pavel Durov’s attitude. What’s changed is their response.

item.title: UK’s Wayve secures strategic investment from Uber to further develop self-driving tech
item.description: Uber is making a strategic investment into Wayve as an extension of the U.K.-born startup’s previously announced $1.05 billion Series C round. The par...
